overview:
This class allows you interact with Cloud Vision.

First, install @google-cloud/vision with npm:

$ npm install --save @google-cloud/vision

If you are running your app on Google Compute Engine, you won't need to worry about supplying connection configuration options to @google-cloud/visionâ€” we figure that out for you.

However, if you're running your app elsewhere, you will need to provide project details to authenticate API requests.

Google Cloud Platform

var vision = require('@google-cloud/vision')();

Elsewhere

var vision = require('@google-cloud/vision')({ projectId: 'grape-spaceship-123', keyFilename: '/path/to/keyfile.json' });

The full set of options which can be passed to @google-cloud/vision are outlined in our Authentication guide.

methods.description:
Wrapper message for double.

The JSON representation for DoubleValue is JSON number.
